page.title: 09A Typical Day-by a child.
page.content: My favourite day is Friday. I get up, wash, clean my teeth, put on my clothes and shoes, and watch the video until I go to school at 8.40am. When I get there I play football until we go into school at 9.00am.The first thing we do is get marked into the register and do an English lesson. Then we go out to play. When we come back in we do a maths lesson until 12. We have our dinner and playtime and when we come back in we do our Domesday Project. We have another playtime and then we do more work. At quarter to four we go home. I play outside until I have my dinner. I then play out until 8.30pm. I come in, get my pyjamas on and watch television until I go to bed.
